original_text: And his tail drew the third part of the stars of heaven, and did cast them to the earth: and the dragon stood before the woman which was ready to be delivered, for to devour her child as soon as it was born.
korean_text: 그 꼬리가 하늘의 별 삼분의 일을 끌어다가 땅에 던지더라 용이 해산하려는 여자 앞에서 그가 해산하면 그 아이를 삼키고자 하더니

sentences.original_text: And his tail drew the third part
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 꼬리가 세 부분 중 한 부분을 끌어당겼고

sentences.original_text: and did cast them to the earth
and the dragon stood before the woman
which was ready to be delivered
as soon as it was born
